input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Medical Data Leaking During VR Training

A medical data leak occurred during a VR training session because of inadequate data encryption You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. Despite rebooting the systems and examining the encryption configurations, the problem still exists My name is Omar Hassan.. I would greatly appreciate prompt support to address this issue and prevent additional leaks.
